====Usage notes====
Used in northern China, especially the areas around Beijing. This word was made popular during the [[Manchu]]-ruled [[Qing]] Dynasty, during which time it was equated with {{cog|mnc|ᡝᡶᡝᠨ||steamed bun}}.
